title: Ukraine’s Top Diplomat Tries to Counter Russia’s Narrative on Africa Tour
description: “I arrived here and I hear, ‘Russia and Ukraine are one people,’” Ukraine’s foreign minister, Dmytro Kuleba, said in Senegal on the first stop of his 10-day trip across Africa.
dc:creator: Elian Peltier and Mady Camara
media:description: Ukraine’s foreign minister, Dmytro Kuleba, speaking at the United Nations Security Council in September.
